text:
Hi Lisa,

I’m so embarrassed as I totally missed your reply! How is the job going? Are you happy that you moved?

I love it where I am, but I’d definitely be lying if I said things were not stressful sometimes! 

Yes, I started on this project in August 2018 and will be on it until August 2020, so it feels like forever! 

Hope all is well with you.

Best 

Micaela
